short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps in inputting text values into multiple text fields using 'Control+B' shortcut.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever felt like manually entering text was so last decade? üï∫ Fear not! 'Recall Script' is here to rescue you from the dark ages. With just a magical 'Control+B' combo, sprinkle your text like fairy dust üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è into those boring input fields. And if you ever try to cram in more than 26 values? Our extension will gently (and hilariously) scold you.

Using the Extension:
Navigate to any website where you want to use the extension.
Press the 'Control + B' keys simultaneously to activate the extension.
A prompt will appear asking you to enter your desired text values. You should separate each value with a space or tab.
Click "OK" to populate the specified input fields with the text values you've entered.
Note: The extension is designed to handle up to 26 values. If you attempt to enter more than 26 values, you will receive an alert notifying you of this limit. If the count of values is below 26, It will write "UPDATE" in the remaining textfields.

Troubleshoot:
1. Make sure capslocks is always off, it conflicts with keyboard shortcut
2. Refresh the page if textfields are not updating or updating incorrectly.
